title: Acropolis Amazing
text: The place it worth every single cent , the Greek culture is just amazing no words to explain all you have to do is visit it once in your life . 4 * for acropolis and 1 star less is because the queue about 5-10 ppl was about 40 mins that day for unknown reasons

title: Expensive
text:
I stop by to eat something fast gyro and can’t really say was delicious was normal tasty for a place like this and the prices are so high there is a lot of places that is much better with less prices
1 star for the place
1 star for the staff ( the guy who gets the payments was rude)

title: Amazing
text:
The place was very beautiful and the park was huge a lot of family’s can have a good time .
I didn’t put 5 star Because I found a little expensive the entrance

title: Delicious food
text:
I can say the food was very good , but me and my wife were there for couple of hours we enjoy each other , but the service was not kind specially the waiter ( wine advisor) he had an ironic face with the waiters and that made a bad ambience. I was in the second floor but it was so much noizy from the plates .something very important the waiters should be taking care of them self’s dress proper and fix their hairs , and unfortunately I don’t want to be rude but the waiter manager was smelling really bad every time he pass by us.
1 * for the place
1* for the food
It can’t be 5 star because a lot of issues with the waiters on the first floor

title: Expensive prices!
text: For my first time I try a margarita at Pizza Hut , it was so fat and I asked thin. Plus in menu was 7€ and she charge me 14,50 I asked her why she didn’t reply ... never again! I suggest you not to choice this one restaurant probably others are much better and chipper

title: Dirty table
text: I stopped by with my friend for a coup of hot chocolate , when we seated the table was dirty and the waiter didn’t clean it even thought he saw the table like that, when we ordered 2 chocolates, he left in a rude way without a thank you . Hot chocolate was good the restaurant was good but a lot of noise and no English speakers . The Old man Manager was very professional and good.
